content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 48-55)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) connected to pipe at (-8.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 3.5) with fuel inventory (29/50 coal)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 3.5) producing 13,500 kW
- Connected pipe network (water system ID 1115, steam system ID 1117)
- Coal buffer system:
  - Wooden chest at (-7.5, 7.5) containing 200 coal
  - Burner inserter at (-6.5, 7.5) (fueled with 9 coal, operational)

### Oil Extraction and Storage System at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) working at 100% efficiency (299,830 crude oil remaining)
- Storage tanks at:
  - (22.5, 40.5) containing 108.15 crude oil
  - (27.5, 40.5) containing 67.25 crude oil
  - (32.5, 40.5) containing 37.76 crude oil
  - (37.5, 40.5) containing 12.28 crude oil (new addition)
- Connected pipe network (crude oil system ID 1118) spanning 18.5,38.5 to 35.5,41.5
- Power network (ID 6100) with 468 small electric poles

## ERROR TIPS

### Pumpjack Placement Errors
- Attempted placements at (19.0,47.0), (19.0,49.0), (19.0,44.5) failed due to:
  - Water obstructions - verify terrain is land before placement
  - Distance limitations - move within 10 tiles before placing
  - Resource verification - confirm crude oil patch exists at location

### Resource Scanning Errors
- Failed to find crude oil at (7.5,30.5) - verify resource existence before scanning

### System Optimization
- Implement automated fuel monitoring for boiler (-7.0,3.5)
- Add secondary water pipeline redundancy at (-8.5,-0.5)
- Establish backup power connections for pumpjack (17.5,40.5)

### Maintenance Procedures
- Scheduled inspections every 4 hours for critical systems
- Implement fuel reserve monitoring
- Create emergency drill schedules

### Expansion Planning
- Verify all placement locations meet:
  - Terrain requirements (land only)
  - Resource availability
  - Proper spacing constraints
  - Power network coverage
